attributes.action: Make homework Easier and have less homework
attributes.additional_details: I want parliament to do this as I don’t get enough social time with my friends as I always have to say no cause I always got homework to do
attributes.background: I want the homework for year7 and above to be easier and also I want there to be less homework given out

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Government aren't responsible for the content of homework, which is a decision for individual schools.

You might like to sign this petition instead

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603551
